snippet: The bride, a former clerk for a Supreme Court justice, is a senior counsel to the United States deputy attorney general, in Washington; the bridegroom is a deputy legal adviser to the National Security Council, at the White House.
lead_paragraph: The bride, a former clerk for a Supreme Court justice, is a senior counsel to the United States deputy attorney general, in Washington; the bridegroom is a deputy legal adviser to the National Security Council, at the White House.
